method.name: POST
method.doc: This web service will list the ACLs which match the given extended attribute name or value. The ACLs that match are returned as a JSON list.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access administrator name.

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access administrator password.

param.name: admin_domain
param.doc: The Verify Identity Access administration domain. The 'Default' domain will be used if this parameter is not supplied.

param.name: acl_attribute_name
param.doc: The extended attribute name to search for. Either an attribute name or value must be specified.

param.name: acl_attribute_value
param.doc: The extended attribute value to search for. Either an attribute name or value must be specified.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: aclListJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the access control list object.
